cont.entity_a: Large and sturdy wheels facilitate movement over deck steps. Solid rubber wheels.
cont.entity_b: Easy to fold up. Requires bungee cords to secure items.

cont.entity_a: Hand truck is heavy and awkward to maneuver.
cont.entity_b: Handle is too short, causing bending over during use. Not ideal for stairs or uneven surfaces.

cont.entity_a: The bottom plate is too short, causing items to tip over when tilting. The load plate is smaller than desired, making it difficult for larger items.
cont.entity_b: Load plate is deeper than most full-size dollies.

cont.entity_a: Made in the USA. Welded and sturdy construction. American-made with high quality and durability.
cont.entity_b: Durable for light duty use but not for heavy loads.
Folds flat for easy storage. Lightweight and fits in overhead compartments on planes.
Rated for 150 lbs but struggles with weights over 50 lbs. Not suitable for heavy objects; maximum effective weight around 80 lbs.

cont.entity_a: Solid tires are preferred over inflatable ones.
Customer service promptly replaced a cracked wheel.
Sturdy and durable, suitable for non-commercial use.
